mapper.select: SELECT ticket_pay_num FROM pay WHERE 1=1 AND scs_num = #{scs_num}

SELECT t.theater_name, count(*) movie_count FROM screen_info si JOIN theater t ON t.theater_num = si.theater_num JOIN screen_session ss ON ss.screen_num = si.screen_num WHERE ss.movie_num = #{movie_num} AND ss.scs_empty_seat > 0 AND (ss.scs_date > CURRENT_DATE OR (ss.scs_date = CURRENT_DATE AND ss.scs_start_time > CURRENT_TIME)) GROUP BY t.theater_name;
